Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: இல்லாரை எல்லாரும் எள்ளுவர் செல்வரை எல்லாரும் செய்வர் சிறப்பு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: All despise the poor; (but) all praise the rich.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A starkly divided scene. On the left side, a poor, destitute person ('இல்லார்') is being scorned and looked down upon by a crowd ('எல்லாரும் எள்ளுவர்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: On the right side, a wealthy person ('செல்வர்') is being praised, honored, and surrounded by an adoring crowd ('எல்லாரும் செய்வர் சிறப்பு').
Layered_Composition.Background: The two central figures could be the same person in different circumstances, highlighting the fickle nature of the world's respect, which is based on wealth alone.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A direct and cynical observation of the world: everyone despises the poor, and everyone honors the rich.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The contrasting reactions of the crowd to the two figures is the entire story. The expressions of scorn versus adoration are key.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Cynical, realistic, a commentary on social hypocrisy.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The poor person's side is dark, shadowed, and colored with bleak, cool tones. The rich person's side is bright, warm, and full of celebratory, golden light.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A balanced, side-by-side composition that forces the viewer to confront the harsh reality of social judgment.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with highly expressive faces in the crowd.
